participant_1.background:
I'm not worried about what others think of my appearance as long as I feel comfortable in my own skin.
I'm interested in learning more about how to grow organic food at home, so I can save money and have more control over what my family eats.
My favorite color is green because it is the color of nature and it reminds me of the importance of protecting our planet.
I bump into things because I am too focused on my thoughts.
i am an old woman who lives on a social security check.

participant_2.background:
I drink my coffee and head to work, worried about my brother who is always getting into trouble.
i can draw.
i am twenty two years old.
I've been trying to find ways to relieve my back pain, but nothing seems to work.
I don't care what my father thinks, I like what I like.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking. I am currently learning more about how to grow organic food at home.
That is really interesting, I have always wanted to learn how to do that myself.
It is not as hard as you might think, and it is very rewarding to be able to eat fresh, healthy food that you have grown yourself.
I can imagine, it would be really nice to know where your food comes from.
Exactly. I am also an old woman who lives on a social security check, so it is a great way to save money on food.
That is a great idea, I will have to look into that.
You should, it is really fun to learn about and to do.
I am sure it is. I love to learn new things.
Me too. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to draw, and I also like to go for walks in the park.
That sounds like fun. I like to draw too.
We should get together sometime and draw together.
Great, I will send you my number.
